library(ISLR)
library(performance)
library(ggeffects)
library(sjPlot)
library(gtsummary)
library(equatiomatic)
set.seed(9)
d <- Wage |> 
  filter(wage < 200 & age < 60) |> 
  sample_n(100, .by = education)
m <- lm(wage ~ age + year + jobclass + education, data = d)
summary(m)

check_model(m)

set.seed(9)
d2 <- Wage |> 
  filter(wage < 200 & age < 60) |> 
  group_by(education) |>
  sample_n(100) |> 
  ungroup()
m2 <- lm(wage ~ age + year + jobclass + education, data = d2)
summary(m2)

Call:
lm(formula = wage ~ age + year + jobclass + education, data = d2)

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-96.773 -16.542  -1.439  14.051  69.929

extract_eq(m2, wrap = T, terms_per_line = 4)

\[ \begin{aligned} \operatorname{wage} &= \alpha + \beta_{1}(\operatorname{age}) + \beta_{2}(\operatorname{year}) + \beta_{3}(\operatorname{jobclass}_{\operatorname{2.\ Information}})\ + \\ &\quad \beta_{4}(\operatorname{education}_{\operatorname{2.\ HS\ Grad}}) + \beta_{5}(\operatorname{education}_{\operatorname{3.\ Some\ College}}) + \beta_{6}(\operatorname{education}_{\operatorname{4.\ College\ Grad}}) + \beta_{7}(\operatorname{education}_{\operatorname{5.\ Advanced\ Degree}})\ + \\ &\quad \epsilon \end{aligned} \]
